name: check headlights
description: The function for checking headlights should return true if the vehicle has the correct number of headlights

name: check tires
description: The function for checking tires should return true if the vehicle has the correct number of inflated tires

name: broken headlight is caught
description: The function for checking headlights should return false if the vehicle has a broken headlight

name: flat tire is caught
description: The function for checking tires should return false if the vehicle has a flat tire

name: extra tire throws error
description: Having an extra tire is invalid and should throw an error

name: extra headlight throws error
description: Having an extra headlight is invalid and should throw an error
